column1: Masters Program in Climate Change, Agriculture & Food Security (MScCCAFS)

The worldâ€™s climate is rapidly changing due to global warming and will continue to do so for the decades and centuries ahead. This poses major challenges for future agricultural systems to sustainably provide food and other bioresources in an equitable manner and to all people.
